website_summaries.verdict: The Dolby Dimension wireless headphones are built for technophiles, with excellent sound quality, noise cancellation, head tracking, and the ability to hear your surroundings and media at the same time.
pros: Easily switched between three different devices
Active noise cancellation with LifeMix for listening to your surroundings

customer_reviews.title: Had no idea I'd like them as much as I do...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing set of headphones! I love the multi-device bluetooth functionally! I've connect them to my Windows PC, Macbook Pro, and my iPhone flawlessly! The sound quality is excellent, with clean highs and deep base. Pretty good for a set of headphone! They're amazingly comfortable with their around-ear design too. Also, and I didn't think I'd love this feature as much as I do, the "LifeMix" feature is amazing! Finally I can sit at my desk next to my wife watching YouTube/Netflix and also hear her if she asks me a question! The included charging dock is also great! All in all a great set of headphones!
customer_reviews.author: Steve Tibbetts

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely not worth the money! Do not waste your time and money with this.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality was mediocre. The noise cancellation was satisfactory. The battery life was barely acceptable. The base charger did not work. I had to plug directly into the USB port to recharge the batteries. I returned the base and they sent a replacement but that didn't work either. That was the last straw. I returned it after that. The amount of money that this thing cost is ridiculous considering the poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Armand

customer_reviews.title: Multi pairing buttons make this the winner
customer_reviews.text: I was quite skeptical given the cost but these are really terrific. The one major issue is the ANC is not even close to as good as Bose or the Sony mx3 but the sound quality is much better than either the 35's or the MX3s. Watching tv and movies is really incredible as the Dolby shines through. The real clincher is the bluetooth switching -- this is where all the other brands struggle and this is where the switching buttons make the difference. If either Sony or Bose offered this then I would recommend the MX3 over these but they don't so I won't!
customer_reviews.author: Jed A Latkin

customer_reviews.title: It's just ok...
customer_reviews.text: It's just ok. Sound quality of course was great. Charging dock is cool and sexy. Unfortunately had a constant crackle in the right ear when it wasn't near fully charged. Too heavy and always sliding off everytime you look down. Ambient sound mode is too tinny and overly fake. Priceponit makes it not worth it. Compared to a Bose quiet comfort and it lost hands down. If it was $200 I probably wouldn't have returned them. Hopefully future generations are improved.
customer_reviews.author: s.mo

customer_reviews.title: Pairing Bluetooth system.
customer_reviews.text: Great product & the technician really helped me a lot to pair both my iPhone and iPad!
customer_reviews.author: banggi

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the price...
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is okay. Not exactly what I was expecting for the price. I've owned several high-end head phones and they just seem mediocre. They feel sturdy and well built. I really like the life mix. It allows you to hear whats going on around you while listening to something through the headphones. I find I occasionally hit the touch controls by accident. Can be annoying. I would say the most annoying feature is the dock though. Several times I've placed the headphones in the dock only to discover they're not charged the next day. This is super frustrating. Overall, unless life mix is the killer feature for you, I wouldn't recommend.
customer_reviews.author: macboypro

customer_reviews.title: Not at all worthy!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this guy in discount of $200 thought the quality of product and sound would be better than any other brands as its from Dolby. But it did not even reach half of my expectations and I see bose or sony sounds way better than this one. Its weigh a ton I feel was not able to hold of my head for more than 30mins. The base charger did not work for me so plugged directly to headphones. All over I am not at all satisfied and returning the product soon.
customer_reviews.author: RBK

customer_reviews.title: work as advertised....
customer_reviews.text: but they are heavy, kind of press the top of your head slightly and hot. oh well. still searching for the best headphones with microphone.
customer_reviews.author: adam helfgott

customer_reviews.title: Best Headphones!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all the headphones and by far these are the best in terms of sound quality, ease of use, wireless charging, fit, multiple bluetooth connection use. I used them and went back to try the QC35 and Sony W3 and I missed the Dolby ones. Bad- Noise cancellation is poor; price is a bit high- only drawbacks.
customer_reviews.author: PK

customer_reviews.title: too difficult to hook up
customer_reviews.text: We had a difficult time following the directions so we returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Pat White

customer_reviews.title: Very convenient headphones for late night vinge watching
customer_reviews.text: Of course my floorstanding speakers are way better with True Dolby Atmos speakers in the ceiling. But after hard days work and if you have a baby, once you tuck the baby to a sleep, you want to have your own TV time, these pair makes you feel you deserve alone time with qualify TV shows.
customer_reviews.author: Young

customer_reviews.title: They don’t work with LG OLED TVs
customer_reviews.text: They don’t work with LG OLED televisions. They require Bluetooth 4.2 but the transmitter doesn’t work with LG TVs. Therefore they are useless if your TV is an LG OLED. I worked with Dolby directly and we tried three of them thinking that each one was possibly defective, but after three in a row I realized these just don’t work with LG TVs. The DOLBY Customer Care bus is absolutely fantastic but unfortunately the headphone transmitter’s just don’t work without your TVs
customer_reviews.author: Imaginative Photography Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Best for TV
customer_reviews.text: This headphones are incredible, everyone I let try them faces always lights up. The best experience is of course watching Dolby atom movies or play Dolby atom video games. Music is where it can gain some improvements, maybe adding EQ would help. But, overall hands down the best headphone I ever own for a wide range of uses.
customer_reviews.author: Travon Bell

customer_reviews.title: Great sound like they say
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones for movies and watch cable I haven’t use much of them yet but like everything about them I have the Bose comfort 2 these Dolby do sound better that I’ve experience so far yea the price was high I use my tax money on these and happy I bought them I’ll be watching 4k blu-rays this weekend sometime.
customer_reviews.author: taylor

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable to wear, even with glasses. Being able to hear things going on is a big plus for me. The sound quality is impeccable, better than my $300 Beats headphones. I also like knowing that I am able to listen to movies, volume up, late at night without bothering my neighbors. The only downside is that I have to pair the headphones with my iPhone or Apple TV each time I want to use them.
customer_reviews.author: hatband

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones. Love the lifemix
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones. They were exactly what I was looking for. I’m probably in the minority but I did not want a noise cancelling headset. Great for watching movies on TV/pad/phone and the 3 device buttons makes it easy to connect to different devices. The lifemix is great, I can use the headphones and still able to carry on a conversation or hear if my son starts crying from his bedroom. Just can’t walk around with the lifemix as it amplifies every noise of moving (clothes rubbing, headphones shifting etc) but I just tap over to noise cancelling or adjust the Lifemix down some. Overall very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: A very comfortable product
customer_reviews.text: Easy to connect, very comfortable and very good noise cancelling function
customer_reviews.author: xi chen

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is very good. They are comfortable to wear. They look nice. The only issue is the sometimes take a little too long to connect via bluetooth, but most of the time there is no issue. Overall, I like them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: Great comfort that shall not use Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.text: The headphone is great. But limited by the Bluetooth connection. It only support stereo which is two channels sound, not surround sound. But the quality of sound is great. The leather and design make it comfortable even wearing it for 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Byron Shi

customer_reviews.title: Cool headphones! Gotta try em!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these headphones, definitely one of the coolest pairs I’ve ever owned. A little spendy but hey when watching movies listening to music amazing experience!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tanner Beisner

customer_reviews.title: Just average headphone.
customer_reviews.text: There is always kind of motor noise in the headphone. Never disappear while it is on. Noise cancellation is not as good as Bose. Comfort is not as good as Bose either. There are noise come from left side of headphone sometimes. Headphone does not fit firmly on head. Need to adjust all the time.
customer_reviews.author: betterlife

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable and amazing sound!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous sound!! The option of leaving headphones on while turning off noise cancelling feature is awesome. Did I mention amazing sound quality?!!! Wow!!!
customer_reviews.author: JUAN HERNANDEZ

customer_reviews.title: not impressive enough for the price
customer_reviews.text: using Sennheiser and expected big difference for being >$200 more expensive. didn't happen. returned them.
customer_reviews.author: Uwe Kleinschmidt

customer_reviews.title: The battery life holds up.
customer_reviews.text: I have to admit the price was scary on a purchase of headphones. I am rewatching all of my movies especially the ones with Dolby atmos enhanced, it sounds great. Although it seems not to be designed for music it still sounds good. The movie experience is great!!
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Needs some improvement
customer_reviews.text: Could use more battery life. Vocals don’t punch through music. Not very mobile.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Pearl

customer_reviews.title: That these are some great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sound quality and the comfort of the headphones. Only thing that's really a problem is the price range and the battery life. If I had paid 3-4 hundred dollars for them I would feel better
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Good for Home theater
customer_reviews.text: Sounds gorgeous, especially when I turned on the virtualization. But this is for indoor use ONLY. I just need all-round NC headphone. That’s why I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: K. Oh

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expect
customer_reviews.text: It was easy to connect .. easy to connect to new iPad but it was duficul with my old iPad .. the software not to all Reagan.
customer_reviews.author: Nasser Alanimi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. I fall asleep to great tunes every night. Helps keep the peace in the family.
customer_reviews.author: Charles L Sorenson

customer_reviews.title: Equally good with movies and music !
customer_reviews.text: The headphones are very high end and well designed. They are very good about connecting quickly and pair up easily again at the touch of a button. Battery life could be better but they do so much so well that it’s understandable. Probably the best Bluetooth headphones I’ve owned. And they’re comfortable too!
customer_reviews.author: James R Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Sound
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound; crystal clear, easy controls, and very comfortable to wear all day
customer_reviews.author: Rav M

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound and technology!
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changing product. Dolby has taken headphones to the next level!
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Raabe

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: I use these headphones so I can watch Game of Thrones or any other movie/show that has fighting or swearing, so my kids don’t hear it. The sound quality is exceptional and the comfort is as well. The setup was very simple and went off without a hitch. These are the best wireless headphones I’ve ever used and in my opinion well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: daveyd12

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth the Price
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a very eloquent writer so I'm just going to get straight to the point. I suffer from chronic migraines so when I heard about these headphones I decided to try them out. The noise canceling feature doesn't reduce or block out ambient sound, strangely if you disable the active noise canceling feature they actually blocks a small amount of noise. Do yourself a favor and don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ender

customer_reviews.title: The Best Headphones For Your Home Theater
customer_reviews.text: I just got a pair of these yesterday and they are definitely the best headphones for movies. Dolby doesn't claim that these headphones reproduce Dolby Atmos, but they do claim that you automatically get the best sound when you play Atmos content and they are correct! I have played Atmos content on these headphones and it is amazing. They are expensive, no doubt, but for people who enjoy watching TV and movies in the highest quality at home, I would highly recommend these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, sound OK.
customer_reviews.text: Got a defective item as the power base did not work. Had to return them. Sound quality was just average for such an expensive set. Nice good looking headphones.
customer_reviews.author: David Aames

customer_reviews.title: incredible sound weird charger
customer_reviews.text: this is by far the best sounding headset I have ever owned (I've owned dozens from BOSE QC25/35 and 700, SONY, Sennheizer etc) it costs a lot more but Dolby flagship store sells them for the same price as Bose 700 . Dolby sounds a lot better than Bose 700 There are three problems: 1) where to get replacement earpads 2) battery life is about 10 hours - they say it's 10-15 but I think it's 15 without noise canceling 3) the stand charger that comes with the headset simply doesn't work at all
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.9 out of 5 stars65 ratings3.9 out of 5 stars
